A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How do you mess up having Mark Hamill back as Luke Skywalker? Disney can try to sell this as some out of the box thinking but no. Just no. Walked out of there thinking WTF was that. Not because of what a wonderful unexpected journey. Never thought I'd see a Star Wars movie with Mark Hamill in it suck. Not because of you Mark. You tried to warn us.
